privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Terpafy (Developer), responsible for the MVP Health Assistant for Endocannabinoid System (ECS) Patients via WhatsApp, collects, uses, stores and protects users' personal and sensitive data, in compliance with the General Data Protection Law (Law No. 13,709/2018 - LGPD).

section1.title: 1. Controller Identification and Contact
section1.description: Terpafy is a project in the Minimum Viable Product (MVP) phase, currently operated by Terpafy (Developer).
section1.statusText: Terpafy operates as a project in validation phase, not currently having a Legal Entity registration (CNPJ). Legal responsibility for data protection lies with the Controller (Developer).

section2.title: 2. Data Collected and Purpose
section2.description: We collect data to provide health assistance, monitoring and education services.

table.personalExamples: Name, Phone Number (WhatsApp ID), Usage Time
table.personalPurpose: User identification, WhatsApp communication, reminder sending and technical support
table.sensitiveExamples: Symptoms, Medication Dosages, Wellness Diary, Effect Reports
table.sensitivePurpose: Monitoring adherence and effectiveness of medical cannabis treatment, generating progress reports
table.sensitiveLegal: Specific Consent (Art. 11, I) and Life/Health Protection (Art. 11, II, f)
table.usageExamples: Interactions with assistant (sent/received messages), WhatsApp platform technical data
table.usagePurpose: Service quality improvement, Artificial Intelligence (LLM) model training

section3.title: 3. Sensitive Data Processing and Consent
section3.description: The processing of Sensitive Health Data is carried out under strict control and is the central purpose of the MVP.
section3.consentText: When starting to use the Health Assistant, the user must provide specific and highlighted consent for the processing of their health data. Without this consent, the monitoring and symptom diary service cannot be provided.
section3.anonymizationText: Health data may be anonymized and used in statistical studies and service improvement, without being linked to the individual user.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.description: Terpafy commits not to sell or rent your personal data. Sharing occurs only in the following cases:
section4.doctorText: Only with express and specific consent from the patient, so the professional can monitor treatment progress.
section4.operatorsText: With technology companies (e.g., cloud providers, WhatsApp API) that process data on behalf of Terpafy, under confidentiality and security contractual clauses.
section4.legalText: To comply with legal, judicial or administrative determinations.

section5.title: 5. Security and Risks (LGPD)
section5.description: Recognizing the sensitive nature of health data and MVP status:
section5.measuresText: We use technical and administrative measures to protect data against unauthorized access, destruction, loss, alteration or disclosure. This includes data encryption in transit and at rest.
section5.riskText: The user acknowledges that, being in MVP phase and without CNPJ, the Controller is an entity in formation. Although the Controller strives to comply with LGPD, the absence of a formal legal structure may, in theory, make accountability difficult in case of incidents.
section5.whatsappText: The user acknowledges that the service is provided through the WhatsApp platform, whose privacy and security policies are the responsibility of Meta Platforms, Inc.

section6.title: 6. Data Subject Rights (LGPD)
section6.description: The data subject has the following rights, which can be exercised at any time through the indicated contact:
section6.right1: Confirmation of the existence of processing
section6.right3: Correction of incomplete, inaccurate or outdated data
section6.right4: Anonymization, blocking or deletion of unnecessary data or data processed in non-compliance

section7.title: 7. Data Retention and Deletion
section7.description: Data is retained only for the time necessary to fulfill the described purposes or to comply with legal obligations. The user may request deletion of their data at any time, except for data that the law requires to be kept.

section8.title: 8. Policy Changes
section8.description: This Privacy Policy may be updated. We recommend that users review it periodically. Continued use of the service after any changes implies acceptance of the new policy.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern the use of the MVP Health Assistant for Endocannabinoid System (ECS) Patients, provided by Terpafy (Developer). By using the Service via WhatsApp, the user agrees to these Terms.

section1.title: 1. The Service and Its Nature
section1.natureText: The Service is a Digital Health Assistant based on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and operated via WhatsApp. It provides dosage reminders, symptom logging, educational content and informative support.
section1.limitationText: The Service IS NOT A SUBSTITUTE FOR MEDICAL CONSULTATION. The Assistant does not perform diagnoses, does not prescribe treatments and should not be used in medical emergency situations. The information provided is informative and adherence support in nature.
section1.mvpText: The Service is in Minimum Viable Product (MVP) phase. This means there may be interruptions, errors or limitations in functionalities. The user accepts to use the Service aware of its experimental and developing nature.

section2.title: 2. Service Use via WhatsApp
section2.platformText: The Service depends on the WhatsApp platform. The user must comply with WhatsApp's Terms of Service and Privacy Policies. Terpafy is not responsible for any problems or interruptions caused by the WhatsApp platform.
section2.communicationText: The user agrees to receive automated and informative messages from Terpafy through the phone number registered on WhatsApp.
section2.responsibilityText: The user is solely responsible for the accuracy and truthfulness of health information entered in the symptom and dosage diary.

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.contentText: All educational content, assistant software and visual identity (logo, colors, typography) are property of Terpafy (Developer) and protected by intellectual property laws.
section3.usageText: The user receives a limited, non-exclusive and non-transferable license to use the Service only for personal purposes and to support their health treatment.

section4.noGuaranteeText: Terpafy (Developer) and its creators do not guarantee that use of the Service will result in specific health improvements or that the information provided is 100% error-free. The user assumes full responsibility for their health decisions.
section4.noCNPJText: The user acknowledges that Terpafy operates as an MVP project and does not have CNPJ. In case of legal disputes, liability will be limited to the Controller (Developer) and the terms established in this document.
section4.damagesText: Under no circumstances will Terpafy be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the Service.
